name: Rayleigh Scattering
description:
Rayleigh Scattering allows you to play in the role of a curious little girl as she tries to figure out three different objects for a school report. She has limited eyesight, but with the ability to ask so many questions, she may figure out what this stuff is yet.

Mostly, you can only take one route of questioning, so choose carefully what questions you ask because you do not know where your wandering mind will take you.

Change Log

v1 (10/17): Released!

Also, hey, if you wouldn't mind perhaps try checking out my first (and very different) game The Vessels of Vantos' Will. I hope you enjoy that as well.
